title: Crossed v04 - Wish You Were Here v01 (2012) (digital webrip) (Em
description:
A contagion-or a curse-has decimated the planet. 
Marked with a bloody cross, the Infected are driven to indulge their sickest desires. In this world of psychos, savages, and sexual predators, the few remaining uninfected learn to keep moving: endlessly fleeing fate. This is the story of those who refused. 
Those who are too desperate, too angry, or too broken to hide from horror. 
It's the story of a comic-book writer who witnessed the downfall of London, and now finds himself in the midst of a new community, a new start, on a barren island off the Scottish coast. Pretending, just for a while, that he's safe, that he's useful... that he has a future. 
It won't last. There's no sanctuary. No fighting back. No hope. 
There's only the Crossed.

Collects v01, TPB covers, and Interludeds.
Two panels/page, 180 pages (including covers)
